column3:
Maru has a mitey problem for you.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Survey the area from the designated location and defeat the starmites that appear.
You know what a starmite is, right? Those hulkin' bugs? Well, they're on my blacklist now!
I got chased by one the other day over by the old Hamsa Hatchery. My hippo startled so badly, I thought for sure I was goin' overboard...
The starmites themselves ain't as dangerous as the fear they instill in our poor hippos, but a hazard's a hazard. Think you could lend us your hand of judgment an' cull the buggers?
You remember those starmites you squashed? Well...they're bein' avenged.
It's hard to tell what's more shaken─our sweet hippos' hearts or our cargo. Either way, all that's waitin' for us on those roads is bugs an' sorrow...
You've gotta help us, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Head back over to the Perfumed Rise an' reunite those starmites with their maker...
You're a savior, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! We can ride easy now, knowin' there are fewer starmites on the roads...
Bein' chased is bad enough, but if we were to hit one at any speed, the cart would be wrecked an' the darlin' hippo injured─if not worse.
Safe ridin's no trivial thing, so I might ask for your help smashin' starmites again sometime. Thanks for always lookin' out for us.
